titleStmt.title: Bloody news from Paris, or, A Relation of the tragical end of some persons of quality at Paris who on the 8th of this instant, August, 1689, suffer'd for their witty zeal the severe revenge of Lewis the Most Christian King.

notesStmt.note: On the execution of two Frenchmen and a German for a pasquil in French and Latin on Louis XIV. The pasquil, an English translation and comment in verse are included.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
